attributes.action: driving licence, passport, ID in one card (non-compulsory)
attributes.additional_details: In these days of computers we should (optionally) be able to get 'one' card (credit card type) that would act as our Passport, driving licence, and general id. This should have a chip on it and could hold more than enough information to cover all these bulky documents. Why have a two part driving licence, a passport, and many other forms of id when we can get all this information on a single credit card type device.
